named-query.name: RANCHER_BY_ID
named-query.description: Get a single rancher by rancherId
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Rancher r WHERE r.rancherId = :rancherId

named-query.name: ALL_RANCHERS
named-query.description: Get all ranchers in database
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Rancher r ORDER BY r.lastName, r.motherName, r.firstName, r.rancherId

named-query.name: ENTERPRISE_RANCHER_BY_ID
named-query.description: Get a single enterprise rancher by enterpriseId
named-query.query: SELECT enterprise FROM EnterpriseRancher enterprise WHERE enterprise.enterpriseId = :enterpriseId

named-query.name: ALL_ENTERPRISE_RANCHERS
named-query.description: Get all enterprise ranchers in database
named-query.query: SELECT enterprise FROM EnterpriseRancher enterprise ORDER BY enterprise.legalName, enterprise.legalId, enterprise.state

named-query.name: ENTERPRISE_RANCHER_BY_RFC
named-query.description: Get a single enterprise rancher record by legal_id
named-query.query: SELECT enterprise FROM EnterpriseRancher enterprise WHERE enterprise.legalId = :rfc

named-query.name: ENTERPRISE_RANCHER_BY_LEGAL_NAME
named-query.description: Get a single enterprise rancher record by legal_name
named-query.query: SELECT enterprise FROM EnterpriseRancher enterprise WHERE enterprise.legalName = :legalName

named-query.name: RANCHER_INVOICE_BY_ID
named-query.description: Get a single rancher invoice record using it's id
named-query.query: SELECT invoice FROM RancherInvoice invoice WHERE invoice.rancherInvoiceId = :rancherInvoiceId

named-query.name: RANCHER_INVOICE_BY_RANCHER_ID
named-query.description: Get a single rancher invoice record using the rancherId
named-query.query: SELECT invoice FROM RancherInvoice invoice WHERE invoice.rancherId = :rancherId

named-query.name: RANCHER_INVOICE_BY_RFC
named-query.description: Get a single rancher invoicing record by legal_id
named-query.query: SELECT invoice FROM RancherInvoice invoice WHERE invoice.legalId = :rfc

named-query.name: RANCHER_INVOICE_BY_LEGAL_NAME
named-query.description: Get a single rancher invoicing record by legal_name
named-query.query: SELECT invoice FROM RancherInvoice invoice WHERE invoice.legalName = :legalName

named-query.name: RANCHER_CONTACT_BY_ID
named-query.description: Get a rancher contact by its contact Id
named-query.query: SELECT contact FROM ContactRancher contact WHERE contact.contactId = :contactId

named-query.name: RANCHER_CONTACT_BY_RANCHER_ID
named-query.description: Get all rancher contacts by rancher id
named-query.query: SELECT contact FROM ContactRancher contact WHERE contact.rancherId = :rancherId ORDER BY contact.firstName, contact.lastName, contact.motherName

named-query.name: ENTERPRISE_CONTACT_BY_ID
named-query.description: Get an enterprise contact by its contact id
named-query.query: SELECT contact FROM ContactEnterprise contact WHERE contact.contactId = :contactId

named-query.name: ENTERPRISE_CONTACT_BY_ENTERPRISE_ID
named-query.description: Get all enterprise contact by enterprise id
named-query.query: SELECT contact FROM ContactEnterprise contact WHERE contact.enterpriseId = :enterpriseId ORDER BY contact.firstName, contact.lastName, contact.motherName

named-query.name: CATTLE_CLASS_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single cattle class record by it's ID
named-query.query: SELECT cattle FROM CattleClass cattle WHERE cattle.catclassId = :catclassId

named-query.name: ALL_CATTLE_CLASSES
named-query.description: Retrieves all cattle class records from database
named-query.query: SELECT cattle FROM CattleClass cattle ORDER BY cattle.catclassName

named-query.name: ALL_CATTLE_TYPE
named-query.description: Retrieves all cattle type records from database
named-query.query: SELECT Cattle FROM CattleType Cattle ORDER BY Cattle.cattypeName

named-query.name: CATTLE_TYPE_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieve a single cattle type record using the type id
named-query.query: SELECT Cattle FROM CattleType Cattle WHERE Cattle.cattypeId= :cattypeId

named-query.name: CATTLE_TYPE_BY_CLASS_ID
named-query.description: Retrieve the cattle types associated with a cattle class
named-query.query: SELECT Cattle FROM CattleType Cattle WHERE Cattle.catclassId = :catClassId

named-query.name: CAT_LOCATION_BY_ID
named-query.description: Retrieves a single catLocation record by ID
named-query.query: SELECT loc FROM Location loc WHERE loc.locationId = :locationId

named-query.name: ALL_CAT_LOCATION
named-query.description: Retrieves all catalog location records from database
named-query.query: SELECT loc FROM Location loc ORDER BY loc.locationName
